name: RockerBox Tycoon
storyline:
Ever wondered what it would be like to mine gold in the hills of Yukon or brave the treacherous waters of Alaska in your rickety dredge? 
Grow your gold mining empire from scratch in this immersive and deceptively intricate incremental game. Fine tune your operations to maximise productivity and become the most successful gold miner in the known world!! Perhaps even the known universe!
summary: RockerBox Tycoon is an ore mining idle game on Flash.
